subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: All In One Device
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Hey Mike! Long time no see. Was starting to think Scotty had beamed you up! Gonna check those links out in a few.

Misty


--- On Sun, 9/14/08, M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@...> wrote:

> From: M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: All In One Device
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Sunday, September 14, 2008, 10:38 PM
> Hi Kristin,
> 
> I found your Ovilus audio files on the internet where you
> posted them
> (cool) and used your link in a little write-up I did today.
> I never heard about the Ovilus until last night.
> I explain that in my write-up.
> Here:
> http://ufomagazine.blogspot.com/2008/09/what-heck-is-ovilus.html
> <http://ufomagazine.blogspot.com/2008/09/what-heck-is-ovilus.html>
> 
> Thanks... and have a great day!
> Mike
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Kristin Morris"
> <ckmorris95@...> wrote:
> >
> > Hi Sean. That's great that you are working on an
> All-In-One. I would
> love
> > to see it too. There is another All-In-One hand held
> by Digital
> Dowsing
> > called an Ovilus and it has speakjet capabilities
> using allophones and
> a
> > scaled-back dictionary, and EMF, digital dowsing rods,
> and more.
> >
> >
> >
> > But I think it's great that you came up with a new
> idea!
> >
> > kristin
> >
